summary.overallFindings: D.R. Horton, Inc. has no publicly available evidence of Responsible AI practices across any of the seven evaluated pillars. There are no disclosures, policies, or documentation addressing transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, or external commitments related to AI. This indicates a significant gap in public Responsible AI readiness or reporting for the company.
